parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token to ensure the idempotence of the request. Generate a unique value from your client for this parameter. The token must contain only ASCII characters and be no more than 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

- zh: Chinese.

- en: English.

Default: en.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description:
The unique ID of the zone.

> You must dissociate a built-in authoritative domain name from its scope before you delete it.
